title: CNN 10 - April 8, 2020
maintext:
Story highlights This page includes the show Transcript
April 8, 2020
Where did Covid-19 come from? The hunt for the mysterious virus' origin is our starting point this Wednesday. Afterward, it's time for a field trip to a historic American bridge that was completed in 1937. And a siphonophore makes waves in the Indian Ocean for strongly resembling Silly String.
TRANSCRIPT
CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society.
